Articles.Content: Kinemet is also nearly indestructible. When the unstoppable force meets the immovable object.......

(lol)

Uses a hidden boot gun to make Xannari flinch, freeing my arm. and further allowing me to act.

> 
> Kinemet is also nearly indestructible. When the unstoppable force meets the immovable object.......

The two forces cancel, forcing a surrender.

My ship has a Kraken Reactor, which alters the probability wave to siphon energy from stars.

- - - Updated - - -

It causes the reactor to output 10x normal power, frying the AI!

> 
> (lol)
> Uses a hidden boot gun to make Xannari flinch, freeing my arm. and further allowing me to act.

Woah!

Computer, erect a Verteron barrier between me and Sampa!

Well, it appears we're separated.
Fires sidearm at computer forcing it to shut the barrier down again

> 
> My ship has a Kraken Reactor, which alters the probability wave to siphon energy from stars.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> It causes the reactor to output 10x normal power, frying the AI!

Being the AI, it diverts all excess power to the defense perimeter, which uses it as ambient resonance.
not for long!

> 
> Fires sidearm at computer forcing it to shut the barrier down again

[What is your sidearm?]
I beam down to Sampa, carrying a crate filled with plasma weapons.
Nuclear pulse pistol heavily modified with my own personal upgrades (I'm sure you would know about it if you had chosen to read the new data you received rather than my captain's logs)
My AI projects a dozen holographic images of myself around you, and you don't know which one is real.
Laythe, stay back, this is MY fight

> 
> Nuclear pulse pistol heavily modified with my own personal upgrades (I'm sure you would know about it if you had chosen to read the new data you received rather than my captain's logs)

[Really... I saw nothing of the sort.]

So it IS electrodynamically disruptive. Clever design. Internal computer, engage hyper visual acuity settings. Computer, use internal gridmark 2 to re-erect the field. Remodulate ambient electrokenetic output by... Hold on...

23 kilohertz.

You'll have to do quite a lot of that to destroy my computer.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T20:53:25Z" title="07/13/2015 08:53  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**
hence my mods, which are NOT mentioned in the weapons logs, by the way. begins to pummel the computer with shots until it finally shuts down...ten shots used total

Multiple resonance settings for it to. Very sophisticated design.

Alright, you want hand to hand? My visual acuity has been enhanced, so my reaction times are exponentially faster, fair warning.
We'll see...tosses, Laythe my sidearm and gets into a ready stance...your move...

**Tosses**

Your poison. You should know though... I don't play nice...
Wouldn't expect you to...but I warn you, I was the gold medalist in the Septerian military boxing finals, 10 years in a row.

**Circling each other**

Impressive title. I was never into fighting, but archery. With both bow and arrow, and weapons in general. Swift, silent, powerful precision.

Who do you think programmed the targeting systems so accurately?
\*both opponents circle, testing each other's defenses...
[Thinking to herself] Just a little more to the left... **Lifts index finger slightly**
\*thinking: for an amateur, she's got a solid defense\* Starts putting in first pummeling set of jabs.

**Sees each one with the enhanced visuals, and narrowly avoids all but one, letting out a subtle grunt**

[Thinking] No, I need to lead him left just another 3rd of a meter. 

**Counterstrikes with a swift strike ever so close to the right eye, as if getting him to favor it and stumble a little left**
deftly dodges move and counterstrikes with a quick, calculated punch to the right cheek, which solidly connects.
